flex-direction_key4: Aapne notice kiya hoga ki jab aap display flex lihte hai `tab` items ek row mei aa jaatei hai.
flex-direction_key5: Aisa isliye hota hai kyunki jab hum **display: flex** likhte hai `tab` by default yaani pehle se hi **flex-direction row** set hoti hai.
flex-direction_key6: **flex-direction** se pata chalta hai ki flex items kis direction mei flex container mein aayegi. Jaise, **flex-direction: row-reverse** karne se items ulte order mein container mei aatein hai.
